argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | dprdff.w | |- W = { h e. X_ i e. I ( S ` i ) | h finSupp .0. } |
| 2 |  | dprdff.1 | |- ( ph -> G dom DProd S ) |
| 3 |  | dprdff.2 | |- ( ph -> dom S = I ) |
| 4 |  | dprdff.3 | |- ( ph -> F e. W ) |
| 5 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_dprdw | |- ( ph -> ( F e. W <-> ( F Fn I /\ A. x e. I ( F ` x ) e. ( S ` x ) /\ F finSupp .0. ) ) ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_mpbid | |- ( ph -> ( F Fn I /\ A. x e. I ( F ` x ) e. ( S ` x ) /\ F finSupp .0. ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_simp2d | |- ( ph -> A. x e. I ( F ` x ) e. ( S ` x ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( x = X -> ( F ` x ) = ( F ` X ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( x = X -> ( S ` x ) = ( S ` X ) ) |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_eleq12d | |- ( x = X -> ( ( F ` x ) e. ( S ` x ) <-> ( F ` X ) e. ( S ` X ) ) ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_rspccva | |- ( ( A. x e. I ( F ` x ) e. ( S ` x ) /\ X e. I ) -> ( F ` X ) e. ( S ` X ) ) |
| 12 | 7, 11 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( ph /\ X e. I ) -> ( F ` X ) e. ( S ` X ) ) |
